日期： Fri, 6 Dec 2024 20:15:38 +0800
附檔： IGP_leaflet_2024.pdf (1 MB)   IGP_MEXTscholarship_leaflet2025_QR.pdf (977 KB)   
The IGP is a program for those who wish to pursue graduate studies in life science at the Graduate School of Life Science, Hokkaido University.
The IGP program was accepted as a special recipient of MEXT scholarship again.


Life Science Researcher Training Program for Solving Global Issues


5 doctoral students and 3 master's students will be funded.

Interested students should contact prospective supervisors to discuss their suitability for this scholarship as soon as possible.
After the supervisor agrees to sponsor the student, the application documents will be submitted to the supervisor, who will then submit them to the IGP administration office by December 20, 2024.
